title: Australian Bush Safari Sleepover with Guided Animal Encounter
description: Enjoy a sleepover with kangaroos, wallabies and more at Walkabout Park in New South Wales. Staying in a comfortable safari tent, this overnight bush adventure for all ages will take you up close to friendly animals under the guidance of Walkabout Parkâ€™s experienced rangers. Included in your stay is two nights in a safari tent plus all-day park access, including up until 5pm on your day of departure.
